reviews.review:
Se a steam deixasse gravar audio para por aqui talvez eu conseguisse expressar o quanto esse jogo é foda. Mas n to conseguindo expressar muito bem por escrito...

É um jogo incrível, músicas envolventes, ambientação incrível, gameplay envolvente de maaaaaaais e a história é a cereja de diamante no topo dessa obra prima. 

O melhor jeito de jogar e procurando conhecer o mundo ao seu redor, mas se quiser jogar só pelo gameplay tb vale a pena.

Apesar de ser o mais linear e ter a pior gunplay da franquia, temos a melhor história (ou estória se for cult na net) da série, e mesmo que os registros de áudio ainda sejam importantes, é adotado uma abordagem mais cinematográfica e sua narrativa não é mais apenas um background para ficar matando uns inimigos aqui e ali, e tem a Elizabeth fodase.


Vale à pena pagar full price? Não recomendo, não pelo jogo ser ruim, mas porque constantemente a coletânea Bioshock fica por 30 conto, pechincha
Good gameplay with great story for me worth to play
the story is deep and as always with bio shock super intresting

This game is a wild ride from beginning to end. The story is amazing and the graphics have aged well due to it's style. The way the game just gets crazier and crazier kept me on the edge of my seat. The ending was unexpected and shocking but a masterfully done conclusion to the story.

Неплохой шутан, первые 2 части мне не понравились от слова совсем, а тут и прикольно, и весело.
7.5 Комстоков/10.

A lot was improved, better hint system than 1-2 definitely.

Gun play is fun, but you're limited to 2 weapons at a time?

Sometimes you just run out of ammo way too easy, sometimes enemy die fast other times they are wearing best armor for a grunt.

vigors are fun if not OP once upgraded. 

Season pass is worth it, In the 2 chapters given, they are vastly different but fun.

the overall problem is limited weapons use, and running out of ammo since grunts and enemies dont drop enough. So you switch out good weapons for ones you hate.

Still a fun game and exploring is worth it to get better health, shield, and vigor resivoire

[h1]Main game [/h1]

This game plays a bit different than the other Bioshock games. All the time there are 2 weapons you can equip and there is less focus on the RPG elements and more focus on fast paced shooting. They reduced the types of "spells" that you can use and introduced some more but I think they are not very exciting to use.  The floating city of Columbia has its charming moments but after a while it becomes very generic, the variety of enemies is lacking as well.

There are some really memorable characters and dialog, the story is very good and your companion - Elizabeth is  charming - beautiful, smart, compassionate, driven, spirited and she knows some tricks. During the game she sometimes picks up coins and offers you ammunition, health and salt  when you are running low. She does speak and comment on the situation fairly often.

I suppose the gameplay would have been better if they simply removed the 2 gun limit.

[h1]DLC - Burial at Sea Part 1[/h1]

Returning to the city of rapture definitely gave me nostalgic vibes.  This time around you will see part of the blooming era of the city, before things went wrong. There are many references to the old games as the story unfolds just a bit before the events of the First Bioshock game. It's nice to see old characters return and to learn a bit more about their lives and ideals. This its true for the 2nd part of the DLC as well. 

Gameplay wise - it seems they listened and they removed the limit of 2 guns. Now you can access all the guns by holding down the E key, but the amount of ammo you can carry around is less.  Guns feel less powerful, ammo is scarce at the beginning, the game has to be played more tactically. I liked the change of pace and the more tactical feel, lying down traps, luring in enemies, using the environment to your advantage.

The interaction between Elizabeth and Booker Dewitt is still very strong as this duo goes through an investigation in order to locate a lost girl.  It build upon the main story and can be considered as a continuation of it.


[h1]DLC - Burial at Sea Part 2[/h1]

Finally, the time has come to play Elizabeth, although it is not going to be the way most of you imagine. Without giving out too much spoilers, lets just say the gameplay requires a lot of stealth and sneaking around. Most of the time you are not required to get rid of the enemies but simple sneak by and get to your destination. 

The story is still a huge appeal of this DLC and it continues directly where the first part ends.


[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
The whole package is well worth to play.  Easily you've got one of the best companion [Elizabeth] in video games and an intriguing story  with a diverse cast of characters, fair bit of mystery and turns of events, all wrapped in with some quantum physics and concept such as multiverse and time travel.

After finishing all the Bioshock games recently, here is my ratings from best to worse:
1 - Bioshock
2 - Bioshock Infinite + DLCs
3 - Bioshock 2
The final and most memorable last part of this master trilogy.

Bioshock Infinite is probably one of the best games I've ever played. The story was really good, and the characters are likable. The only critique I have is that the gameplay can get pretty repetitive, but its still a fun experience. I would definitely recommend this game.

An absolute ride from beginning to end. This game turns the series on its head and takes all the things from previous games and smashes it into a unique setting and series of events leading to the climax at the end. Highly recommended and I cannot wait to play the DLC for this game. I regret not playing this sooner and being a delicious 8 years late. An experience that cannot be given by many games, and this one was one of the greats going into my favorites of all time.

honestly its a huge downgrade from bioshock 1&2, they limit you to only 2 weapons like every other generic shooter the game is much more linear, no map, no manual heals, and the addition to shields is really dumb. instead of balancing the game properly lets just add regenerating shields, really bad game designs and decisions from the developers all around.

its just a huge disappointment, honestly just go play bioshock 1 if you haven't better in pretty much every single aspect.

伊丽莎白人物塑造的非常出色，还有令人叹为观止如同天堂梦幻般的空岛，很难想象13年竟然有如此出色的游戏。
但难过的是，制作这款游戏的工作室不久之后就解散了，不知道有生之年能否再次欣赏即使在8年后的今天看来也如此出色的游戏。
操作跟画面没什么说的，作为一款13年发布的游戏，也就是一般吧，但是剧情可以说是非常好了。

Прекрасная часть серии, сюжет держит в напряжении до самого конца.
Хоть прохождение и не занимает много времени, но все компенсируется большим количеством того, что можно найти.

游戏节奏有点乱 任务指向不明确
在skyline上的战斗很有意思 但是大部分场景没有skyline
魔法太鸡肋了 很多是近距离才有作用 但这是个fps游戏 而且伤害普遍低 虽然种类多但在战斗过程中顾不上使用

讽刺某些历史的手法比较俗套 在游戏过程中很难注意到 并且需要一些英语基础
AI 很笨 射击手感一般 推荐纯fps玩家使用狙击枪

Los gráficos son tan fascinantes que casi me olvido de seguir adelante con el juego. El escenario, la historia, la forma en que Elizabeth interactúa contigo... tantos detalles y elementos que se pueden mencionar y que hacen de este juego una gran experiencia que sin duda recomiendo. 

Simplemente magnífico 10/10

When you sleep on a game like this you'll regret it. I wish I had played this when it first came out because it still holds up now all these years later. There are obvious flaws but graphics are beautiful for such an old title, game play is smooth and there is little to complain about with combat mechanics. If you can get the Bioshock bundle I would jump on it.

I've owned this on 2 other systems, so the 2 hour playtime for me at the time of posting this review should realistically be closer to 50 hours. 

Without going into spoilers, this game has so much character, atmosphere, and depth that it was a genuine surprise. I can't think of another game the past decade that hooked me so fast and kept me playing more than Bioshock Infinite. It is absolutely incredible from beginning to end.

And if you REALLY take your time and explore dialogues, recordings, and the world around you, the game draws you in even further and the weight of everything happening compounds. 100% worth buying even at full price, and if you ever catch it on sale, then you are doing yourself a disservice in not purchasing it.

If you regret playing this game, I'll eat my fucking hat.

Bioshock Infinite não é igual aos anteriores da trilogia, por se passar em um cidade voadora e pelo seu estilo de gameplay mais fluida e rapida. Esse jogo é incrivel, e por mais que no começo e meio do jogo vc pense que "Infinite tem nada haver com os anteriores", não se preocupe! No final tudo fará sentido mas tambem, é confuso de se entender tambem.

- PROS

-Gameplay fluida e rapida
-Todos os plasmids são bons, não exista um plasmid que vc não irá usar no jogo
-São diversas roupas (Substituindo os genetonics dos anteriores) e em sua grande maioria são bons, podendo te deixa indeciso em qual usar 
-A mecanica de vc poder só carregar duas armas de sua escolha é muito bom, te dando diversos estilos de gameplay e mudando varias situações do jogo
-A Elizabeth é simplesmente MUITO, mas MUITO prestativa, ela te da vida, vigor, munição e dinheiro sempre que vc estiver precisando
-A historia é muito boa mas tambem causa bastante confusão
-As duas DLCs do Jogo são otimas, principalmente a Burial at Sea pt 2
-A segunda DLC te traz uma experiencia totalmente diferente da trilogia Bioshock, controlando a Elizabeth e tendo um estilo de jogo stealfh (Tipo metal gear) que super combina com a personagem e é bem divertido tambem
-As DLCs trazem Plasmids novos, bons e bem legais tambem
-As fendas da Elizabeth sempre te dão algo muito util


CONTRAS

- É triste saber que a 2K partiu uma DLC em duas partes apenas para lucrar mais
- As DLCs só existem para tapar buracos na trama e explicar algumas coisas
- Desbalanceamento das armas na campanha, visto que 60% dela eu joguei com a pistolinha que simplesmente é a melhor arma
- Burial at Sea pt 1 é uma DLC que não tem balas, vc SEMPRE fica sem munição (O mesmo da pt 2 mas eu até entendo a falta de munição já que as armas lá são para vc passar desapercebido)
- O comando de coletar tudo no Bureal at Sea é pessimo, vc ter que apertar 2 botoes para pegar todo o Loot é ridiculo (Primeiro apertar o E para vasculhar e depois do F para pegar tudo) Pq eu n posso apenas floodar o E? é bem mais rapido e melhor. Sem contar que eu nn consigo mudar isso, é triste

No geral, o jogo é ótimo, super recomendo jogar caso queira só um FPS de tiro pra lá e tiro pra cá, ele como eu já disse é rapido, frenetico e tem diversas mecanicas legais. Recomendo que vc jogue primeiro o Bioshock 1 e depois vá direto pro Infinite e no final, vc joga o Bioshock 2 ou vc pode inverter a ordem do 1 com o Infinite que dá certo

Nota: 9.5/10
